Container.Name: MakerWorks v2
Container.Overview: MakerWorks v2 is a self-hosted 3D model hub built with Next.js 14, Prisma, and Postgres. The template deploys the web application container from GitHub Container Registry; pair it with any reachable Postgres instance (local container, remote VM, managed service) and map a persistent storage share for uploaded STL/OBJ/3MF assets plus thumbnails. **Important:** create a custom Docker network named `makerworks-net` (e.g., `docker network create makerworks-net`) before deploying so the web and database containers share the same isolated network.

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: Port the MakerWorks Next.js server listens on

Config.Name: Storage
Config.Description: Persistent directory for uploaded models, covers, and avatars

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: Postgres connection string (must be reachable from the container)

Config.Name: POSTGRES_HOST
Config.Description: Postgres hostname when not using docker-compose (e.g., the IP/host of your DB)

Config.Name: POSTGRES_PORT
Config.Description: Postgres port

Config.Name: POSTGRES_DB
Config.Description: Postgres database name

Config.Name: POSTGRES_USER
Config.Description: Postgres user

Config.Name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Postgres password (required when not using docker-compose)

Config.Name: JWT_SECRET
Config.Description: Secret used to sign user sessions (set to a long random string)

Config.Name: BASE_URL
Config.Description: Public URL users access (used for redirects/cookies)

Config.Name: COOKIE_SECURE
Config.Description: Set to true when BASE_URL is HTTPS so auth cookies are secure

Config.Name: STORAGE_DIR
Config.Description: Internal storage path (normally leave at /app/storage)

Config.Name: PLA_PRICE_PER_KG_USD
Config.Description: Price of a 1kg PLA spool (USD) used for estimator

Config.Name: PETG_PRICE_PER_KG_USD
Config.Description: Price of a 1kg PETG spool (USD) used for estimator

Config.Name: PLA_PRICE_PER_KG_CAD
Config.Description: Optional CAD override for PLA per-kg cost

Config.Name: PETG_PRICE_PER_KG_CAD
Config.Description: Optional CAD override for PETG per-kg cost

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_PLA_PRICE_PER_KG
Config.Description: Expose PLA per-kg cost to the client (used for cart price previews)

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_PETG_PRICE_PER_KG
Config.Description: Expose PETG per-kg cost to the client

Config.Name: COLOR_SURCHARGE_RATE
Config.Description: Extra cost rate per additional color beyond the first (server-side)

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_COLOR_SURCHARGE_RATE
Config.Description: Expose the color surcharge rate to the client UI

Config.Name: STRIPE_SECRET_KEY
Config.Description: Stripe secret key (starts with sk_live_ or sk_test_)

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY
Config.Description: Stripe publishable key used by the in-app checkout UI

Config.Name: CURRENCY
Config.Description: Back-end currency (USD or CAD)

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_CURRENCY
Config.Description: Client-facing currency label (must match CURRENCY)

Config.Name: ADMIN_EMAIL
Config.Description: Email for the bootstrap administrator account

Config.Name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password for the bootstrap administrator (rotated on change)

Config.Name: ADMIN_NAME
Config.Description: Display name for the bootstrap administrator account

Config.Name: DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN
Config.Description: Optional bot token used for Discord announcements

Config.Name: DISCORD_CHANNEL_ID
Config.Description: Discord channel ID used for announcements
